languages.text: "Зачем? Зачем мне останавливаться? Зачем тебе меня останавливать? Она пустит тебе пулю в голову так же, как пустила Теодоре, после первого же мелкого подозрения в ереси!"

traits.locale_text: "Зачем? Зачем мне останавливаться? Зачем тебе меня останавливать? Она пустит тебе пулю в голову также, как пустила Теодоре, после первого же мелкого подозрения в ереси!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Зачем? Зачем мне останавливаться? Зачем тебе меня останавливать? Она пустит тебе пулю в голову так же, как пустила Теодоре, после первого же мелкого подозрения в ереси!"

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora, the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora, the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ？なぜやめなければならない？なぜ私を止める？異端と疑われるわずかな理由を見つけた瞬間、シオドーラにしたように、こいつはあなたの頭に銃弾を撃ち込むわよ！」
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ？なぜやめなければならない？なぜ私を止める？異端と疑われるわずかな理由を見つけた瞬間、シオドーラにしたように、こいつはあなたの頭に銃弾を撃ち込むわよ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “为什么？我为什么要住手？你为什么要阻止我？只要她找到一丁点理由怀疑你是异端分子，她就会一枪打爆你的头，就像她杀害西奥多拉那样！”
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “为什么？我为什么要住手？你为什么要阻止我？只要她找到一丁点理由怀疑你是异端分子，她就会一枪打爆你的头，就像她杀害西奥多拉那样！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué? ¿Por qué debería parar? ¿Por qué intenta detenerme? ¡Acabará con una bala en la frente de su parte, como hizo con Theodora, en cuanto encuentre la más mínima razón para sospechar que es {mf|un|una} hereje!».
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué? ¿Por qué debería parar? ¿Por qué intenta detenerme? ¡Acabará con una bala en la frente de su parte, como hizo con Theodora, en cuanto encuentre la más mínima razón para sospechar que es {mf|un|una} hereje!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Warum? Warum sollte ich aufhören? Warum solltet Ihr mich aufhalten? Sobald sie auch nur den kleinsten Grund findet, Euch der Ketzerei zu verdächtigen, wird sie Euch eine Kugel in den Kopf jagen. Genau wie sie es bei Theodora getan hat!"
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum? Warum sollte ich aufhören? Warum solltet Ihr mich aufhalten? Sobald sie auch nur den kleinsten Grund findet, Euch der Ketzerei zu verdächtigen, wird sie Euch eine Kugel in den Kopf jagen. Genau wie sie es bei Theodora getan hat!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Pourquoi je devrais m'arrêter ? Et pourquoi vous voudriez m'arrêter ? Elle vous mettra une balle dans la tête dès qu'elle aura le moindre soupçon, comme elle l'a fait pour Théodora ! »
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Pourquoi je devrais m'arrêter ? Et pourquoi vous voudriez m'arrêter ? Elle vous mettra une balle dans la tête dès qu'elle aura le moindre soupçon, comme elle l'a fait pour Théodora ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Neden? Neden duracakmışım? Bana neden mâni oluyorsun? Kâfirlik ettiğine dair en ufak şüphe gördüğünde Theodora'yı vurduğu gibi seni de başından vuracak!"
languages.original_text: "Why? Why should I stop? Why should you stop me? She'll put a bullet in your head just like she did with Theodora the moment she finds the smallest reason to suspect you of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Neden? Neden duracakmışım? Neden durduruyorsunuz beni? Kâfirlik ettiğinize dair en ufak şüphe gördüğünde sizi de Theodora'yı vurduğu gibi başınızdan vuracak!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
